Package de.tum.cit.fop.maze

Class Player

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.fop.maze.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player class represents the player character in the game, including its movement, animation, collision detection, state management (e.g., speed boosts), and rendering. It handles user input for player movement, running, speed boosting, and special effects like red visual effects and death.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMapTileLayer collisionLayer)
      Constructs a new Player with the specified collision layer. Initializes the player's textures and sets the initial state.
      Parameters:
      collisionLayer - The collision layer used to detect collisions with the environment.

  • Method Details

    • loadPlayerFromTiledMap

      public static Player loadPlayerFromTiledMap(com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap map, com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMapTileLayer collisionLayer)
      Loads the player's initial state from the TiledMap by reading its position from the "player" layer.
      Parameters:
      map - The TiledMap containing the playerâ€™s initial position.
      collisionLayer - The collision layer for detecting collisions.
      Returns:
      The initialized Player object.

    • update

      public void update(float delta, boolean moveUp, boolean moveDown, boolean moveLeft, boolean moveRight, boolean runKeyPressed, Friends friends)
      Updates the player's state each frame, including movement, running, and effects. Handles player input for movement and manages the playerâ€™s speed and animations.
      Parameters:
      delta - The delta time between frames.
      moveUp - Whether the player is moving up.
      moveDown - Whether the player is moving down.
      moveLeft - Whether the player is moving left.
      moveRight - Whether the player is moving right.
      runKeyPressed - Whether the player is pressing the run key.
      friends - The Friends object to manage following friends.

    • revertToPrevious

      public void revertToPrevious()
      Reverts the player's position to the previous valid position after a collision.

    • render

      public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
      Renders the player on the screen. If the player is in a red effect, applies a visual pulse effect.
      Parameters:
      batch - The SpriteBatch used to render the player.

    • increaseSpeed

      public void increaseSpeed(float duration)
      Increases the player's speed for a given duration.
      Parameters:
      duration - The duration for the speed boost in seconds.

    • resetSpeedBoost

      public void resetSpeedBoost()
      Resets the player's speed to normal after the speed boost duration expires.

    • savePlayerState

      public void savePlayerState()
      Saves the player's current state (position, speed, effect timers, etc.) to persistent storage.

    • loadPlayerState

      public void loadPlayerState()
      Loads the player's state from persistent storage and restores it.
